member.name: T:JobApplication.Data.ConfigurationData
member.summary: This class holds the connection string for connectiong to the data base

member.name: T:JobApplication.Data.JobApplicationDbContext
member.summary: This is the DbContext for the database that this application uses.

member.name: M:JobApplication.Data.JobApplicationDbContext.OnConfiguring(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptionsBuilder)
member.summary: This method checks if the optionsBuilder is not already configured and it is not, configures it by connencting to the database via connection string.

member.name: M:JobApplication.Data.JobApplicationDbContext.OnModelCreating(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelBuilder)
member.summary: This method calls the OnModelCreating method of the DbContext class that is inherited.
